Package Person

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Person.Person
Person.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
CSVFormat
public class Student extends Person implements CSVFormat
Represents a student in the system.

Student is a subclass of Person.

      public Student(String name, int id, String password)
      Creates an instance of Student.
      Parameters:
      name - The name associated with the student.
      id - The identification number associated with the student.
      password - The password associated with the student.

    • Student

      public Student(String name, int id, String password, Programme programme)
      Creates an instance of Student with a programme.
      Parameters:
      name - The name associated with the student.
      id - The identification number associated with the student.
      password - The password associated with the student.
      programme - The programme which the student belongs to.

    • csvHeader

      public String csvHeader()
      Returns a header for the student's information.

      This header includes: Name, ID, Password and programme.
